message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be extremely valuable to your business.  I'm confident it's worth at least $1,200,000 to you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,100,000. This is a significant price reduction from its true value, and I believe it's a deal you can't refuse. Let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
